name: Work in Progress (Ossuboi, afrost)
description:
Work in Progress - "It's not a bug, it's a feature"

This game was created during the 48 hour "Can You Jam?" game jam in March of 2021. The theme for the jam was "It's not a bug, it's a feature."

This was our first game jam and our first game as well.

You can use a gamepad or keyboard (WASD, Control, Space). 

Let us know how you liked it!

----------------

Created by:

Oskar Unt, Tarmo Unt & Siim Püvi
